mapper.sql: id ,name ,password ,perm_login as permLogin ,perm_admin as permAdmin ,att_change_password as attChangePassword
mapper.select: SELECT FROM access WHERE id = #{id} AND att_user = 1 LIMIT 1
SELECT FROM access WHERE name = #{name} AND att_user = 1 LIMIT 1
SELECT DISTINCT UPPER(SUBSTR(name,1,1)) letters FROM access WHERE att_user = 1 ORDER BY letters
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM access WHERE att_user = 1
SELECT FROM access WHERE att_user = 1 AND UPPER(name) LIKE CONCAT(UPPER(#{initial}),'%')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM access WHERE att_user = 1 AND id = #{userId} LIMIT 1
